import React,{useState} from 'react' import {useHistory} from 'react-router-dom' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import "../Form/Form.css" import axios from 'axios' const Form = () => { const [comeco,setcomeco]=useState([]) const history= useHistory() function onchange(ev){ const {name,value} = ev.target console.log({name,value}) setcomeco({...comeco,[name]:value}) } function submit(ev){ ev.preventDefault() axios.post('http://localhost:3004/promotions&_ord',comeco).then((response)=> { history.push('/loja1') } ) } return(
Volotar para loja

Nova promoção

) } export default Form;
